name: Mastodon & Glitch-soc Variable Width
description: Make sure you set your instance by pressing "Customize Settings" above, if you are not on mastodon.social! To handle more than one instance, you will need to install this and then edit it. Instructions are inside the CSS. Based on Mastodon Wide, but scales with browser's width. Should be safe to mix with other styles. Contact @siina@cute.science if you have any questions, comments, or concerns!
additional_info:
Supports Mastodon front-end and Glitch-soc front end.

Add your instance in the Style Settings!

The drawer (column where you type) can be adjusted:
* Default (same as every column)
* Narrow (narrow like original Mastodon)
